H0.text: The Royal Navy introduced limes to the standard diet for crewmen to prevent what. Beriberi

H1.text: The Royal Navy introduced limes to the standard diet for crewmen to prevent what. Scurvy-like symptoms

H2.text: The Royal Navy introduced limes to the standard diet for crewmen to prevent what. Malaria

H3.text: The Royal Navy introduced limes to the standard diet for crewmen to prevent what. Scruvy

A4.text: The Merchant Shipping Act 1867 required all ships of the Royal Navy and Merchant Navy to provide a daily 'lime or lemon juice' ration of one pound to sailors to prevent scurvy.

A5.text: Ordered to lead an expedition against Mauritius, Rear Admiral Gardner was uninterested in the wort, malt, and elixir of vitriol that were still being issued to ships of the Royal Navy, and demanded that he be supplied with lemons, to counteract scurvy on the voyage.
